item.description:
This group has been specially formed for entertainers and professionals actively involved in the entertainment industry. Artists, writers, filmmakers, musicians, please come and share your ideas, questions and concerns with other like-minded professionals and receive valuable advice.

The Entertainment Group is back in full swing as we bring you Alison Driscoll, a social media specialist, who will be speaking on "Effective Use of Social Media for Entertainers." Bring your ideas and questions to share with other entertainers as we examine the special needs of artists and fans with regard to social media networks like Twitter, Facebook, Linked In and others! Networking to precede and follow, as well as Q&A.
item.name: Revolve Nation Entertainment Roundtable & Networking Group
